title: 49ers lose Kittle but carry his 'energy' to win
content: Despite another devastating injury to a team captain, the 49ers embodied the spirit of George Kittle to help will themselves to a playoff win over the Eagles.

title: Sirianni defends Brown after drops, sideline spat
content: Eagles coach Nick Sirianni defended receiver A.J. Brown after a pair of drops in Sunday's loss to the Niners and also downplayed an animated interaction the two had in the opening half.

title: 'Warrior' Allen helps get Bills over hump on road
content: Fourth-quarter comebacks happen to be an important part of the team's success this season -- all behind quarterback Josh Allen -- and that continued Sunday as the reigning MVP led the Bills past the Jaguars in the AFC wild-card round 27-24.

title: Irish deny battery allegation against Freeman
content: Notre Dame has denied that Marcus Freeman made physical contact with anyone after the football coach was accused of battery in a police report filed Jan. 3.

title: LaFleur to discuss future with Packers prez soon
content: Packers coach Matt LaFleur said Sunday that he expects to meet with team president Ed Policy about his future in Green Bay either late Sunday night or Monday.

title: LSU women's hoops hands No. 2 Texas first loss
content: No. 12 LSU pulled away late to hand No. 2 Texas its first loss this season, 70-65 on Sunday. It's the Tigers' first win over an AP top-2 team since 2008.

title: Disappointed Jags see loss as 'growing moment'
content: The Jaguars believe some good -- and some motivation -- will come out of Sunday's bitter 27-24 loss to the Bills in the AFC playoffs.

title: U.S. bobsledder Horn OK after scary solo ride
content: U.S. bobsledder Kris Horn survived a frightening ride down the track in St. Moritz, Switzerland, on Sunday, after his three teammates failed to make it into the four-man sled at the start of a World Cup race.

title: üëÄ Offseason guide for all eliminated NFL teams
content: The NFL offseason has arrived for 20 teams. What must each do to have a better season in 2026? We have outlooks, early buzz and predictions.

title: The NFC playoff bracket is set: Reasons for optimism for the Seahawks, 49ers, Bears and Rams
content: Let's preview the divisional round matchups. How can each team win next weekend and advance? Here's what to know.

title: 'Not sure why they felt the need': NBA execs on the Trae deal and trade season's next move
content: Tim Bontemps and Brian Windhorst survey the league on the Young deal and what comes next for the Wizards and Hawks.

title: Everything to know about the U.S. Olympic figure skating team
content: The U.S. Olympic figure skating team was named Sunday -- and could dominate at the Milan Cortina Olympics in less than a month.

title: Men's: A weak nonconference slate could doom Georgia
content: The Bulldogs are a few SEC losses away from the wrong side of the bubble due to a number of low-quality wins.

title: Women's: Why LSU's seed could be determined in the next two games
content: LSU has work to do after its 0-2 start in SEC play, but opportunity arrives with the season's most crucial two-game stretch.

title: How the Steelers forged Aaron Rodgers-Mike Tomlin connection
content: The bond between QB and coach has led Pittsburgh to its first home playoff game since the 2020 season.

title: 'Hungry for more': 49ers' petty posts at Eagles tops NFL wild-card trolls
content: The NFL wild-card round had its fair share of petty posts after big wins, led by the San Francisco 49ers.

title: With no manager, Manchester United continue to sink to new lows
content: In a season full of lows, Manchester United's early FA Cup exit only deepens their misery, denying them any chance of silverware this season.

title: WNBA, WNBPA fail to reach new CBA at deadline
content: The WNBA and its players' union failed to agree to a new collective bargaining agreement or an extension of the previous one by Friday's 11:59 p.m. ET deadline.

title: Solak: The Bears are a second-half team, and you can never count them out
content: Perhaps we shouldn't be surprised the Bears came back to beat the Packers. They've been doing this all season.

title: From future HOF pitchers to a veteran catcher: Best fits for under-the-radar MLB free agents
content: Did your favorite team miss out on the biggest stars of this winter? Here are 15 players to sign instead.

title: Power Rankings: Where every team stands in the new year
content: Though there are still free agents to be signed, let's reassess the standings midway through the offseason.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Barcelona want Marcus Rashford stay
content: Barcelona want Marcus Rashford to stick around, and Bruno Fernandes also leave Manchester United this summer. Transfer Talk has the latest.

title: Hinduism vs Hindutva: Mani Shankar Aiyar draws distinction, triggers row; BJP hits back
content: Congress leader Mani Shankar Aiyar stated that Hindutva is "Hinduism in paranoia," arguing it incites fear among Hindus towards Muslims. He contrasted this with Hinduism, calling it a spiritual religion that has thrived for millennia without Hindutva's protection. BJP leader Sudhanshu Trivedi countered that Hindutva represents the core essence of Hinduism, or 'Hindu tattva,' and cherishing Hinduism is Hindutva.

title: Bengaluru: Student kills techie for rejecting advances; sets flat ablaze to mask crime
content: A Bengaluru software engineer's death, initially thought to be from a house fire, has been reclassified as murder. A second-year pre-university student was arrested for allegedly smothering the woman after she resisted his advances and then setting her flat ablaze to conceal the crime.

title: 'My mum keeps all my trophies': Virat Kohli
content: Virat Kohli described his career as a dream come true after becoming the fastest batter to 28,000 international runs. He expressed immense gratitude for his journey, emphasising his joy in bringing happiness to fans through cricket. Kohli also shared his aggressive batting mindset and revealed his trophies are sent to his mother.

title: 'We may have to act': Iran wants to 'negotiate' with US? Trump makes fresh claim as protests intensify
content: President Trump stated Iran's leaders called to negotiate amid protests and threats of military action. He indicated a meeting might be set up but warned of potential US action due to the crackdown. US officials are considering strikes on Iranian security services involved in suppressing demonstrations.

title: Billionaire divorce: Bill Gates transfers $8 billion to Melinda French Gates
content: Bill Gates reportedly transferred nearly $8 billion to his ex-wife Melinda French Gates' private foundation, significantly boosting its assets. This substantial divorce-related payout marks a major financial disclosure following their 2021 separation. French Gates is now directing these funds towards her philanthropic work focused on women and families.

title: Raheman Dakait arrested: Bhopal crime lord nabbed in Surat; multi-state syndicate busted
content: Surat police apprehended Aabid Ali Irani, the alleged kingpin of the Bhopal-based Raju Irani gang, after he evaded a major police crackdown. Wanted for numerous crimes across multiple states, Irani is accused of a shocking attempt to set a family ablaze. The gang specialized in impersonating law enforcement and employing elaborate disguises for their heists.

title: Microsoft AI CEO: We're building superintelligence backwards; need controls before trust
content: Microsoft AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman urges the industry to prioritize containment over alignment in AI development, warning against pursuing superintelligence without first ensuring control. He advocates for a "Humanist Superintelligence" approach, focusing on practical applications like medical AI and clean energy, to maintain human oversight and avoid uncontrolled autonomous systems.

title: 'Dhurandhar' day 38: Ranveer-led film's global collection now Rs 1254.9 crore
content: In an astounding theatrical journey, Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' has captivated audiences for over 38 days, raking in an impressive Rs 805.65 crore net domestically. On a global scale, the espionage thriller has soared to new heights, achieving an unprecedented Rs 1254.9 crore worldwide, making it the highest-grossing Hindi film to date.

title: 'Kidnapped, strangled to death': 6-yr-old girl raped in Bengaluru; accused arrested
content: A six-year-old girl was found murdered after being raped and strangled. Her father filed a missing person report. Police apprehended the suspect, Yusuf Khan, on a train. Khan, a neighbour, allegedly committed the crime due to domestic disputes and rivalry with the victim's mother. He has been arrested and faces rape charges.

title: Mass dog killings rock Telangana: ‚Äò300 stray dogs‚Äô given lethal injections; sarpanches among 9 booked
content: Police have filed cases against nine individuals, including two village sarpanches, in Hanumakonda district for allegedly killing approximately 300 stray dogs with lethal injections. The incident, which occurred between January 6 and 8, was reported by an NGO after buried carcasses were discovered.

title: Aadhaar update guide: How to verify your linked mobile no & email; step-by-step guide
content: The Aadhaar number is now essential for financial linking, including bank accounts and insurance. The UIDAI's myAadhaar portal offers services like address updates and mobile/email verification. Users can easily verify their linked mobile number and email ID by following simple steps on the official website.

title: 'Shubman Gill is an aggressive captain': Harshit Rana
content: Pacer Harshit Rana lauded Shubman Gill's captaincy, calling him a "free and aggressive captain" who empowers his teammates. Rana highlighted Gill's clear decision-making and composure under pressure. This leadership style was evident as India secured a four-wicket victory against New Zealand in the opening ODI, with Gill contributing a crucial 56.

title: 'Playing cute': Trump 'inclined' to keep ExxonMobil out of Venezuela ‚Äî here's why
content: President Trump expressed displeasure with ExxonMobil's assessment of Venezuela's investment climate, calling their stance "too cute." This follows a meeting where Trump urged oil firms to engage directly with the US, not the Venezuelan government. ExxonMobil's CEO deemed the country "uninvestable" due to current commercial frameworks. Trump's administration is actively seeking US oil company investment to aid Venezuela's recovery.

title: German Chancellor arrives in India: Merz begins first official visit
content: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz is on a two-day visit to India, meeting PM Modi in Ahmedabad. Their agenda includes visiting Sabarmati Ashram and the International Kite Festival, followed by bilateral talks in Gandhinagar. Discussions will center on strengthening the India-Germany Strategic Partnership, focusing on trade, technology, and defense cooperation, building on recent high-level interactions.

title: Connor McDavid‚Äôs wife Lauren Kyle confirms delay in Sports Club Atelier collection
content: Lauren Kyle, founder of Sports Club Atelier and wife of Connor McDavid, shared an update on her upcoming collaboration with Hockey Canada, confirming a slight delay in the launch. She emphasized the importance of getting every detail right. The collection follows the success of her earlier releases, which blend hockey culture with luxury streetwear.

title: Vanessa Bryant thanks fans for braving rain at emotional Mamba book signing
content: Vanessa Bryant recently hosted a 'Mamba & Mambacita Forever' book signing, drawing large crowds despite rain. The event celebrated Kobe and Gianna Bryant's enduring legacy through art and community. Fans shared personal stories, highlighting how Vanessa's foundation continues to inspire and provide sports opportunities for underserved youth, honoring her family's memory.

title: Ayesha Curry promotes Jamaican tourism after devastating hurricane
content: Ayesha Curry is urging fans to support Jamaica's recovery from Hurricane Melissa by visiting the island. She highlighted that tourism is crucial for the Jamaican economy, with nearly 30% of the workforce dependent on it. Curry emphasized that a vacation serves as a donation, with airports and most hotels now operational.

title: 'Military looking at it': Has Iran crossed red line? Trump says US studying 'very strong options'
content: Amidst escalating anti-government protests in Iran, US President Donald Trump indicated "very strong options" are being considered by the military, suggesting a red line may have been crossed. Iran's parliament speaker warned that US bases and Israel would become legitimate targets if attacked, vowing severe punishment for protesters.

title: Mustafizur row: PCB approaches ICC to host Bangladesh's T20 World Cup matches
content: The situation follows the decision by IPL franchise Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) to leave out Bangladesh fast bowler Mustafizur Rahman from their squad for the 2026 season, despite buying him for Rs 9.2 crore in the mini auction.

title: 'Not afraid of empty threats‚Äô: Sanjay Raut‚Äôs ‚Äòcan shut Mumbai in 10 mins‚Äô remark sparks row; Fadnavis responds
content: Shiv Sena (UBT) MP Sanjay Raut claimed his party can still shut down Mumbai in 10 minutes, calling it their biggest achievement. Maharashtra CM Devendra Fadnavis dismissed the threat, stating the UBT faction lacks the strength and recalling past failed attempts to disrupt Eknath Shinde's return to the city.

title: Run machine rolls on: Kohli breaks Sachin's record; surpasses Sangakkara
content: Virat Kohli became the fastest player to reach 28,000 international runs in 624 innings during India's ODI against New Zealand. He also surpassed Kumar Sangakkara to become the second-highest run-scorer in international cricket. The Baroda Cricket Association honored Kohli and Rohit Sharma at the historic match.

title: Travis Kelce reportedly needs Taylor Swift‚Äôs approval before another NFL season
content: Travis Kelce is weighing whether to return to the NFL after a disappointing season with the Kansas City Chiefs. Sources say he is not ready to retire but will take weeks to decide, discussing his future with family and fianc√©e Taylor Swift as personal priorities and roster uncertainty complicate the call.

title: Contract killing? Shooters waited 3 hours before murdering Shalimar Bagh woman
content: A woman was shot dead in Delhi, with police suspecting a contract killing. Shooters reportedly waited for her for hours. The victim was a witness in her husband's murder case, who himself was gunned down previously. Authorities are investigating potential links to past criminal activities and rivals, with raids underway.

title: Karur stampede case: Vijay to appear before CBI in Delhi today
content: TVK president Vijay is set to appear before the CBI in New Delhi on Monday regarding the Karur stampede probe, which claimed 41 lives. The central agency issued a summons for his examination. Ahead of his appearance, TVK sought security from Delhi police. The Supreme Court had transferred the investigation into the September 2025 incident to the CBI.

title: Iran denies arresting Indian nationals amid protests; ambassador calls it 'fake'
content: Iran's ambassador to India has branded reports of Iranian police arresting Indian nationals as "fake," urging reliance on credible sources. These rumors emerged amidst ongoing protests across Iran, which have plunged the nation into political and economic uncertainty. The alleged detentions, if true, would involve 10 Afghans and 6 Indians, purportedly linked to recent rioting in Abadan.

title: 5 months, 500 villages: How dogged policing tracked down 15-yr-old boy‚Äôs tormentor
content: A grueling five-month, 10,000km search across Haryana and UP culminated in the arrest of Anil, accused of kidnapping a teenager, forcing bonded labor, and torturing him. The 15-year-old victim, who lost an arm in a fodder-cutter accident, was abandoned by his captor.

title: Sheer black dress, chocolate hair: BLACKPINK‚Äôs Lisa debuts at Golden Globes 2026
content: BLACKPINK's Lisa made history at the 2026 Golden Globes as the first Thai artist and K-pop performer to present. She captivated on the red carpet in a dramatic sheer black Jacquemus gown, complemented by a new dark chocolate hair color. This appearance solidified her status as a global fashion force, showcasing the growing influence of Asian pop culture in Hollywood.

title: Josh Allen injury update: Why Bills fans are anxious and who would replace him if needed
content: Buffalo Bills quarterback Josh Allen is trending due to recent injury scares. Fans are worried about his health as the postseason approaches. Mitchell Trubisky is the team's backup quarterback. He has experience and has stepped in for Allen this season. The Bills are monitoring Allen's condition closely. They are prepared to rely on their depth if necessary.

title: German Chancellor in India LIVE: Merz arrives in Ahmedabad, to meet PM Modi today
content: Merz is scheduled to visit the Sabarmati Ashram, participate in a kite festival and attend a skill development event in Ahmedabad

title: Should the age of consent be lowered?
content: While some argue that the current law criminalises consensual relationships among adolescents, others warn that lowering the age could undermine protections against child exploitation. This debate comes amid rising POCSO cases, highlighting a growing conflict between adolescent autonomy and the need to safeguard vulnerable minors

title: Congress slams 'trouble-engine' U.P. govt. for 'brutal lathi-charge' on MGNREGA Bachao protesters
content: The Congress agitation demanding the withdrawal of the VB-G RAM G Act and restoration of MGNREGA as a rights-based law in its original form, the right to work, and the authority of panchayats will continue till February 25

title: Will speak after 100 days on new government: Opposition leader Tejashwi Yadav
content: RJD leader Tejashwi Yadav returns to Patna, pledges to monitor the new government‚Äôs performance after 100 days of its formation

title: Former chief of Naval staff Arun Prakash asked to establish identity under SIR
content: Collector of South Goa Egna Cleetus said that she will go through the Navy veteran‚Äôs enumeration form and the authorities will reach out to him

title: NRI doctor-YouTuber Sangram Patil detained at Mumbai airport over defamation case
content: The BJP functionary, who filed the complaint, has alleged that Dr. Patil spread false information about the ruling party and made derogatory remarks against its leaders

title: German Chancellor Friedrich Merz arrives in Ahmedabad, on his first official visit to India
content: PM Modi will meet Friedrich Merz today in Ahmedabad. This will be Mr. Merz‚Äôs first official visit to India

title: City residents feel the chill as temperature drops
content: The Regional Meteorological Centre forecast light to moderate rain for Monday at a few places over Tamil Nadu,¬†Puducherry,¬†and Karaikal

title: Use of state power against Opposition shrinks democratic space, says Ashwani Kumar
content: Former Union Minister says there is a ‚Äúdiscernible drift today towards a muscular state at the expense of a constitutional one‚Äù

title: Hemant Soren cherishes memories of late Shibu Soren on  82nd¬†birth anniversary
content: Remembering his father who passed away last year on August 4, Mr. Soren said that though he is not present but his contribution, sacrifice, dedication and his thoughts were still alive today.

title: Indore diarrhoea deaths: Blindspotting in India‚Äôs cleanest city
content: Contaminated drinking water, supplied through government-laid pipelines, led to a diarrhoea outbreak in Indore, killing at least 8 and affecting about 3,000 people. Mehul Malpani reports on unplanned parts of one of Madhya Pradesh‚Äôs most promising cities, the delays in laying pipelines, and the blame game that follows when deaths get international coverage

title: Suspected Pakistan drones seen hovering over areas along LoC, IB; search ops launched in three J&K districts
content: All the flying objects came from the Pakistan side, and returned after hovering over Indian territory for few minutes,  officials said

title: Won‚Äôt let BJP and Adani take away Mumbai, say Thackeray cousins
content: They accuse the party of pursuing divisive politics and systematically ‚Äòisolating‚Äô Mumbai‚Äôs Marathi Manoos; the cousins claim the national party has been facilitating land grab to benefit Adani Group and conspiring to ‚Äòseparate Mumbai from Maharashtra and bring it closer to Gujarat‚Äù

title: 484 electors from Kolkata‚Äôs Chinese community deleted during SIR: study
content: A majority of the deleted voters, 389 out of 484, have been categorised as untraceable or absent; the three assembly constituencies that were analysed by the researchers of Sabar Institute are Kasba, Entally and Chowrangee

title: ‚ÄòSuperstar‚Äô Krishna‚Äôs bond with Vijayawada cast in bronze at Lenin Centre
content: Vijayawada MP recalls the veteran actor‚Äôs deep bond with the city as a bronze statue portraying his Ram Raju role from Eenadu is unveiled

title: Environment Ministry funds sought for forest management committees
content: Move necessary to ‚Äòcorrect the perception‚Äô that the forest bureaucracy was at odds with the goals of community-led forest resource management, officials say

title: Right time to buy immovable property in Andhra Pradesh, says RERA chairman
content: Rise in investments is an indication that the construction sector is getting back on track, says Siva Reddy

title: Chennai Metro Rail train chugs along from Porur to Vadapalani
content: The Chennai Metro Rail Limited conducted a trial run after the elevated viaduct from¬†Porur¬†to¬†Vadapalani¬†was completed. The section¬†includes a 4-km double-decker line from¬† Alwarthirunagar¬†to¬†Alapakkam¬†¬†

title: Six years after law amended, Centre yet to constitute Arbitration Council of India
content: Senior officials in the Union Law Ministry said it took years for corporates and public sector undertakings to shun ad-hoc arbitration and go far institutional arbitration to settle commercial disputes

title: On Camera, Truck Drives Into Crowd Supporting Iranian Protesters In US
content: A video showed the protesters swarming the truck, throwing punches at the driver, and thrusting flagpoles through the driver's side window.

title: Rape Accused Shot In Leg While Trying To Escape Police Custody In Assam
content: A man accused in a rape case was injured in a police encounter in Assams Kokrajhar district, while two police personnel also sustained injuries during the incident.

title: Trump Says Iran "Wants To Negotiate" Amid Anti-Khamenei, But Warns "US May Act Before The Meet"
content: US President Donald Trump has said that Iran's leadership, led by Supreme Leader Seyyed Ali Hosseini Khamenei, had called him seeking "to negotiate" after his threats of military action amid mass anti-government protests in the Islamic Republic.

title: Indian Arrested In Iran Amid Anti-Khamenei Protests? What Tehran Said
content: US President Donald Trump has said that he's weighing a range of responses to escalating unrest in Iran, including possible military options, amid reports claiming over 500 people have been killed during Tehran's crackdown on nationwide protests.

title: Trump's Motorcade Rerouted Due To 'Suspicious Object' At Palm Beach Airport
content: President Donald Trumps motorcade took a different route than usual to the airport as he was departing Florida on Sunday due to a "suspicious object," according to the White House.

title: "He's Very Good At That": Trump Plans To Speak To Musk To Restore Internet In Iran
content: US President Donald Trump said on Sunday that he plans to speak with billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk about restoring internet in Iran, where authorities blacked out service amid ongoing anti-government protests.

title: ISRO Spy Satellite Launch Today To Boost India's Private Space Ecosystem
content: India's trusted workhorse rocket, the Polar Satellite Launch Vehicle (PSLV), is poised for a dramatic comeback after last year's setback.

title: TVK Chief Vijay To Appear Before CBI Today In Karur Stampede Case
content: The stampede occurred on September 27 last year at a massive political rally addressed by Vijay, marking one of the deadliest crowd disasters in Tamil Nadu's recent political history.

title: Punjab Man Found Chopped In Drum Was Injected Before Murder, Reveals Probe
content: Fresh details have surfaced in the brutal murder of a 35-year-old man, whose dismembered body was recovered from an abandoned plot near Jalandhar Bypass on Thursday.

title: 4 Trunk Drains In Rekha Gupta's Plan To Fix Delhi's Waterlogging Issue
content: Delhi Government, under the leadership of Chief Minister Rekha Gupta, has taken a major and far-reaching step to strengthen the city's drainage system as part of its resolve to develop Delhi into a modern, global and developed capital.

title: Thick Layer Of Toxic Froth Resurfaces On Yamuna River In Delhi
content: A thick layer of toxic froth resurfaced at the Yamuna ghat in Kalindi Kunj here on Sunday, making large stretches of the river nearly invisible, even as experts reiterated that it is disruptive for the river's ecology.

title: 'Right To Higher Education Can't Be Curtailed Lightly': Delhi High Court
content: The Delhi High Court has observed that the right to pursue higher or professional education, though not explicitly listed as a fundamental right under the Constitution, imposes an affirmative obligation on governments and cannot be curtailed lightly.

title: Uddhav And Raj Thackeray Launch Joint Attack On BJPs "Fake Hindutva"
content: Shiv Sena (UBT) chief Uddhav Thackeray and his cousin Raj Thackeray on Sunday launched a scathing attack against the BJP over its "fake Hindutva" at a joint rally for civic polls.

title: Yellow Alert Issued As Biting Cold Wave Grips Delhi
content: Biting cold gripped the capital on Sunday as it experienced the first cold wave of the season, with minimum temperatures falling below 3.0 degrees Celsius at some places, according to India Meteorological Department (IMD) officials.

title: Farmer Dies By Suicide After Rs 4-Crore Land Fraud, Names Accused In Video
content: A farmer allegedly committed suicide by shooting himself on Sunday after being duped of Rs 4 crore in a fake land deal in Uttarakhand's Kathgodam area, police said.

title: 538 Killed In Crackdown On Protests In Iran: Report
content: A crackdown on nationwide protests in Iran has killed at least 538 people and even more are feared dead, activists said Sunday.

title: US Citizen's Charity Bag Triggers Bomb Scare At Ministers Bungalow
content: An abandoned bag found near a minister's bungalow in south Mumbai triggered panic on Sunday until police determined that it had been left by a US citizen who wanted to give away his clothes and shoes, officials said.

title: Woman Slapped, Abused By Man On Busy Andhra Road, None Came To Her Rescue
content: A woman in Andhra Pradesh's Visakhapatnam district took to social media on Sunday to describe an incident where she was slapped and abused by an unknown man while commuting to her workplace.

title: Chinese Kite Strings Turn Deadly Across Madhya Pradesh
content: The use of banned "Chinese" kite strings, synthetic threads known for their razor-sharp metallic coating, has caused a series of horrific injuries and at least one death across the state, raising urgent concerns over public safety.

title: Embroiled In Ankita Bhandari Murder Case, Ex-MLA Suresh Rathore Charged In Another Matter
content: Former BJP MLA Suresh Rathore, who is already facing several cases in connection with the murder of Ankita Bhandari, has now found himself in one more FIR after a contractor complained against him for not returning his car, Uttarakhand Police said.

title: RSS evolving with time, taking new forms: Mohan Bhagwat
content: The RSS chief was addressing an event held at the organisation‚Äôs office here to launch the song album of the upcoming film Shatak, which chronicles the 100-year journey of the RSS

title: Trinamool‚Äôs campaign song for Assembly election plays up Bengali identity, language
content: The party‚Äôs three-minute, 13-second campaign song titled ‚ÄòJotoi koro hamla, abar jitbe Bangla‚Äô (attack as much you can, Bengal will win again)

title: Mehbooba Mufti takes exception to NSA Ajit Doval‚Äôs ‚Äòrevenge for history‚Äô remark
content: Calling for revenge in the 21st century over centuries-old events is merely a dog whistle, inciting poor and uneducated youth to target a minority community, Ms. Mufti said.

title: Faster, demand-led approach needed for PSE privatisation: CII
content: In its proposals for the Union Budget 2026-27, the industry lobby calls for a rolling three-year pipeline, outlining which enterprises are likely to be taken up for privatisation during this period

title: Bhairav Battalions to make Army Day Parade debut in Jaipur on January 15
content: Two battalions of the special force will participate in this year‚Äôs parade‚ÄîSouthern Command‚Äôs 2 Bhairav Battalion, known as the ‚ÄòDesert Falcons‚Äô, and South Western Command‚Äôs 4 Bhairav Battalion

title: Indian Army officer from Bengaluru wins UN Secretary General‚Äôs Award 2025
content: Under her initiative and command, the team successfully conducted short- and long-distance patrols, integrated reverie patrols, and dynamic air patrols to far-flung counties of the host nation

title: Grok AI issue: X ‚Äòaccepts its mistake‚Äô, assures it will comply with Indian laws, say government sources
content: Around 3,500 pieces of content have been blocked, and over 600 accounts deleted, according to sources

title: WRD begins construction of 2 new check dams across Palar in Tirupattur
content: The ‚Çπ77.30-crore project will also involve repairs of two existing check dams across the river at Jafrabad and Kondai Oosi villages near Ambur town. The project is being funded by the National Bank for Agriculture and Rural Development

title: As German Chancellor Merz lands in Gujarat, activists demand that Modi ask for Ariha‚Äôs return
content: Officials say Ariha is meeting parents, Indian embassy in Germany regularly, no movement on government request that the five-year-old be brought up in Indian home

title: CM‚Äôs credibility eroded, says Gaurav Gogoi
content: Hitting out at Himanta Biswa Sarma, the State Congress president said Assam cannot continue to be divided by hatred and violence

title: YouTube channel booked for uploading misleading PU exam paper
content: The uploaded content allegedly mimicked the Hindi language preparatory examination paper for PU students scheduled to be held on January 9

title: 50,000 saplings to breathe new life into Nellore, says Narayana
content: Municipal Administration and Urban Development Minister says the massive plantation drive is aimed at developing Nellore Assembly constituency into a green lung space and enhancing overall urban greenery

title: Gandikota Festival off to a colourful start in Kadapa
content: Besides the historic fort, the ancient Madhavaraya temple, and the Jama Masjid, an helicopter ride offers visitors a breathtaking view of the gorge that is touted as India‚Äôs equivalent to the Grand Canyon in the U.S.

title: Kerala may go for full-fledged revamp of Waqf Board
content: A Madras HC decision restraining the T.N. Waqf Board from leaving posts vacant prompts Kerala to rethink strategy and to go in for full reconstitution of the board

title: Cattle transported in container trucks ‚Äòrescued‚Äô in Nandyal district
content: The cows were transported in an inhumane manner, allege Allagadda MLA, who along with her brother and followers, intercepted the vehicle near Allagada after receiving information

title: 10th edition of Ni Fest concludes in Thrissur
content: Exhibition of camp works will be held on January 17 and 18 at Nidarshan and on January 23, 24 and 25 at the Fine Arts College Gallery, Thrissur

title: Announce separate municipal corporation for Secunderabad: Srinivas Yadav to govt.
content: Says peaceful rally with around 10,000 participants would be held on January 17 from Secunderabad Railway Station to the Gandhi statue on MG Road to mount pressure on the government

title: ‚ÄòPennu Case‚Äô movie review: An average con drama sans any exciting elements
content: With a protagonist who commits marriage fraud at its centre, Pennu Case fails to use any of the possibilities of the material at hand

title: NHAI creates four Guinness World Records in Andhra Pradesh
content: In association with concessionaire Rajpath Infracon Private Limited, it sets the records, two each on January 6 and 11, in the implementation of the Bengaluru‚ÄìKadapa‚ÄìVijayawada economic corridor

title: Tracing Traffic Violations: Helmetless riding dominates Bengaluru‚Äôs traffic violations in 2025
content: 2025 was also the year that traffic police personnel returned to the streets to book cases, drawing the ire of many

title: PM should speak on jobs not give history lessons, says Priyank Kharge
content: He criticises Union Home Minister Amit Shah for prioritising political destabilisation over border protection and internal security

title: KITE brings a digital makeover to State School Arts Festival
content: From online registration to QR-coded certificates, State School Arts Festival being held in Thrissur is being transformed into a fully smart, technology-driven event

title: Flamingo Festival draws families to Nelapattu Bird Sanctuary near Sullurpeta
content: As migratory birds settle in for the breeding season, Nelapattu attracts visitors from across South India despite logistical challenges

title: North may remain in cold wave grip for 2 more days

title: In a 1st in 4 decades, peaks in Garhwal Himalayas remain snowless in Jan
content: the high-altitude peaks of Tungnath in the Garhwal Himalayas have remained snow-free through Jan so far . experts say the prolonged deficit in rainfall and snowfall has begun to adversely affect key medicinal plant species of the alpine region .

title: Kerala MLA held in 3rd rape case; Congress washes hands of him
content: police said the Palakkad MLA used his position to sexually abuse women . a court sent him to jail after investigators said he could intimidate complainants, influence witnesses and destroy evidence . the latest case stems from an alleged assault on a 31-year-old woman at a hotel in Thiruvalla on April 8, 2024 .

title: Kanpur cops bust alleged conversion racket, arrest 3
content: three people, including a woman, arrested on charges of converting people from the scheduled castes by offering them incentives . police said there were complaints from residents about mass conversions to Christianity, allegedly done by luring people with valuables and money . the police are now investigating the interstate network and possible foreign funding links .

title: Labour code: Companies' Q3 numbers to reflect higher gratuity
content: the first impact of the labour codes will be felt in the December quarter results . companies will need to update their gratuity liability provisions in line with Ind AS 19 . some companies are in the process of obtaining actuarial valuations .

title: DMK rejects Congress' power-sharing demand
content: DMK has rejected demands from a section of ally congress's state unit for a share in power . the tradition would continue even after the ensuing elections . this is the first time the demand has gained traction over the past several months .

title: I don't use mobile, internet for day-to-day work: NSA
content: NSA reveals he does not use a mobile-phone or internet in his day-to-day work . he said it is important to take the right and farsighted decisions at the utmost time . the former NSA director advised it is importer for the youth .

title: Appeasers, dividers still active: PM Modi at Somnath

He has been extensively writing and editing articles across a wide spectrum of subjects, including politics, crime, finance, environment, ports and maritime infrastructure, music, arts and culture, sports, social issues, health, science, and feature stories. title: Why did a CM have to personally retrieve file, asks BJP
content: BJP dismisses CM Mamata Banerjee's contention that her dramatic intervention in the ED raids at I-PAC premises in Kolkata was in her capacity as TMC president . he also hits out at the state govt for the alleged attack on its Bengal leader Suvendu Adhikari's convoy .

title: Engage with Lanka to save Tamils rights: Stalin to PM Modi
content: he urges the govt to ensure the proposed constitutional reforms do not undermine the rights of Sri Lankan Tamils . he is writing the letter in the wake of detailed representations highlighting the 'grave risks' posed to Sri Lanka's Tamil community .

title: Yunus government says reports on attack on minorities is 'propaganda'
content: the interim govt sought to downplay media reports as attempts "to destroy communal harmony through false propaganda" the government has repeatedly brushed aside reports of incidents related to minorities as propaganda . a communication of a businessman in Narsingdi was promoted as a committee .

title: 'Martyrdom': JeM chief says thousands of suicide bombers ready to go; experts call it 'hollow threat'
content: Raj Shekhar Jha is a journalist for the Times of India with over a decade of experience in reporting on national security, terrorism, crime and prisons.

title: Rams stave off Panthers in wild-card thriller to advance
content: the Rams have advanced to the divisional round of the playoffs for the second year in a row . the los Angeles Rams beat the Carolina Panthers 34-31 on saturday . quarterback Matthew Stafford said he would like to not throw it to their team .

title: India closer to becoming 2nd nation to re-fuel on-orbit satellite
content: Chethan Kumar is a Senior Assistant Editor with the Times of India. Aside from specialising in Space & Science, he has reported extensively on varied topics, with special focus on defence, policy and data stories. He has covered multiple elections, too. As a young democracy grows out of adolescence, Chethan feels, there are reels of tales emerging which need to be captured. To do this, he alternates between the mundane goings-on of the Common Man and the wonder-filled worlds of scientists and scamsters, politicians and soldiers. In a career spanning nearly 18 years, he has reported from multiple datelines ‚Äî Houston, Florida, Kochi, Hyderabad, Chennai, Sriharikota (AP), NH-1 (J&K Highway), New Delhi, Ahmedabad, Raichur, Bhatkal, Mysuru, Chamarajanagar, to name a few ‚Äî  but is based out of Bengaluru, India‚Äôs science capital that also hosts the ISRO HQ. Read More

title: What's next for LaFleur, Brian Gutekunst after the Packers' wild-card loss?
content: the last time the Packers did anything with the contracts of coach Matt LaFleur and general manager Brian Gutekunst, it happened in relative secrecy . the news did not leak out until just before training camp in July that year . it was never clear why then-team president Mark Murphy tried to keep it a secret .

title: ‚ÄòTheir defense is two dog sleds‚Äô: Trump pushes Greenland ‚Äòtakeover‚Äô; shares why US needs to 'acquire' it
content: At TOI World Desk, our dedicated team of seasoned journalists and passionate writers tirelessly sifts through the vast tapestry of global events to bring you the latest news and diverse perspectives round the clock. With an unwavering commitment to accuracy, depth, and timeliness, we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, delivering a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers. Join us on a journey across continents as we unravel the stories that shape our interconnected world. Read More

title: The 10 teams that have gotten off to the hottest portal starts
content: college football's offseason transfer window opened one week ago . a dozen FBS programs have secured commitments from 20 or more players in the portal . there are 10 programs off to impressive starts in building up their rosters for 2026 .

title: CFP National Championship first look: Previewing Miami-Indiana
content: 136 teams hope to taste postseason glory . a champion will be crowned in a matchup . the team will face off at 7:30 p.m. ET on january 19 . it's the first time the team has won the title game in 2025 .

title: WNBA CBA Q&A: Nneka Ogwumike, Napheesa Collier on 'standstill'
content: the WNBA CBA is scheduled to expire at 11:59 p.m. ET on friday . the league and its players union will likely enter into a stage of "status quo" a work stoppage or lockout can be declared without notice . sources say negotiations have netted minimal progress .

title: How Lamar Jackson, Todd Monken, Ravens' locker room impacted Harbaugh's firing
content: it seems no one inside the Baltimore Ravens ' training facility had conviction that Tuesday would become the most shocking day in franchise history . the belief inside the building was that the Ravens would undergo staff changes, perhaps at the coordinator positions, but that Harbaugh would remain the head coach in 2026 .

title: Ranking the best players in the college football transfer portal
content: the offseason transfer portal window for college football players opens at midnight ET on Jan. 2 . there's no spring transfer period this year, so teams have one big chance to get their rosters right for 2026 . here are ESPN's rankings of the top players in the portal .

title: Raphinha shines as Bar√ßa get thrilling win over Madrid in Supercopa final
content: lvaro Carreras and Ral Asencio spurned great late chances to take the game to a penalty shootout . bar√ßa beat real madrid 3-2 to retain the supercopa de Espaa in sao paulo .

title: NFL wild-card arrivals deliver statement looks
content: wild-card weekend opens the postseason with win-or-go-home stakes . players matched the moment with arrival fits worthy of the stage . a key playoff game in Foxborough, mass., saw a cornerback tapped into Boston sports lore .

title: Josh Allen, Bills outlast Jaguars to advance to AFC divisional round
content: the defense did its job to preserve a 27-24 loss to the Bills . quarterback Josh Allen tipped a Trevor Lawrence pass and safety Cole Bishop came away with the game-ending interception . the ball was in the hands of the team, just as the team would like .

title: Ja Morant trade guide: Four proposals for Memphis -- if it can find a suitor
content: two-time All-Star point guard Ja Morant is averaging career lows in minutes, rebounds and 2- and 3-point percentages . he was suspended for one game earlier this season for conduct detrimental to the team . the 26-year-old has had multiple off-court issues and injuries .

title: College football buzz: What we're hearing about playoff expansion
content: a 16-team college football playoff format will begin as soon as 2026, sources say . there's still a stalemate between the two powerbrokers . the deadline for completing the format moved from Dec. 1 to Jan. 23, 2026 .

title: Niners defeat defending champs for NFC wild-card win
content: the 49ers won 12 games despite playing most of the season without defensive end and linebacker . they had withstood the repeated injuries to some of their brightest stars . despite that devastating injury to another team leader and captain, they continued to battle .

title: Follow live: Maye connects with Henry for first TD of the game as Patriots extend lead
content: the wild-card weekend kicked off with a wild one in Carolina . the los Angeles Rams beat the Panthers 34-31 in the fourth quarter . in the late window, the Green Bay Packers led by as many as 18 points .

title: Four wild-card games, four overreactions, four big questions: Bills finally to the Super Bowl?
content: the 49ers narrowly edged the Panthers, and the Bears took down the Packers in a wild comeback . we asked national NFL reporter Dan Graziano and NFL analyst Ben Solak to help size up every wild-card matchup from the opening round .

title: MLB offseason grades: Cubs nab Bregman on five-year deal
content: the 2025-26 offseason is officially here, and we have you covered with grades and analysis for every major signing and trade this winter . if it's a big-money free agent signing that changes the course of your team's future or a blockbuster trade, check back in for the freshest analysis through spring training .

title: Semifinal takeaways: Utter dominance has become the norm for Indiana
content: Texas, Penn State and Clemson were among the preseason national title favorites . the hoosiers and Hurricanes will play in the CFP national championship on Jan. 19 in the Hard Rock Stadium . they will play for their first title since 2001 .
